mapper.sql: ID,PROFIT_NO AS profitNo, OWNER, CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO AS customerTypeNo, CUSTOMER_TYPE_NAME AS customerTypeName, PRICE_TYPE AS priceType, PROFIT_MODE AS profitMode, PARENT_ID AS parentId, STATUS, REMARK, VALID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME AS createTime, MODIFIER, MODIFIER_TIME AS modifierTime, INSURANCE_NO AS insuranceNo,INSURANCE_NAME AS insuranceName, PROFIT_COUNT AS profitCount, PROFIT_MONEY AS profitMoney
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT
from INS_PROFIT WHERE PROFIT_NO = #{profitNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select DISTINCT
from INS_PROFIT WHERE VALID = 1 AND CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO = #{customerTypeNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select DISTINCT
from INS_PROFIT WHERE VALID = 1 AND CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO = #{customerTypeNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
update INS_PROFIT
CUSTOMER_TYPE_NO = #{customerTypeNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CUSTOMER_TYPE_NAME = #{customerTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSURANCE_NO = #{insuranceNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
PRICE_TYPE = #{priceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROFIT_MODE = #{profitMode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_TIME = #{modifierTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PROFIT_NO = #{profitNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}
